      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Item> RefrigeratedTruck.addCargo(Item a)
      Inherited from Truck, this method adds an Item to RefrigeratedTruck cargo if item is not temperature controlled.

      Inherited from Truck, this method adds an Item to OrdinaryTruck cargo if item is not temperature controlled.
      java.util.List<Item> Truck.addCargo(Item a)
      This method adds an Item to the truck cargo, cargo is represented in a List format.
      static java.util.List<Item> Stock.asList(Item[] a)
      This method adds an Item to a List of type Item.
      static java.util.List<Item> Store.GenerateManifest()
      This method generates a manifest, calling a CSV writer and using set and get methods.
